keyMappings:
unmap f
unmap F
unmap yf

map K nextTab
map J previousTab

map ; LinkHints.activateMode
map : LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map y; LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map <a-;> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito

" map aa LinkHints.activateModeToOpenImage
" map ay LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadImage

map M toggleMuteTab

" map <space>w Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map D scrollFullPageDown
map U scrollFullPageUp
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
map <c-f> scrollFullPageDown
map <c-b> scrollFullPageUp

unmap <a-p>
map <a-P> togglePinTab
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
a: https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php?search=%s&title=Special%3ASearch&wprov=acrw1_-1 ArchWiki
vf: moz-extension://49e2af00-14f2-446c-aa68-852afefb1663/pages/options.html Vimium Firefox Config
vc: extension://djmieaghokpkpjfbpelnlkfgfjapaopa/pages/options.html Vimium Chrome/Edge Config
